start.text: Attack! Get in there, you maggots!
Move out maggots! Time to die!

start_boss.text: Listen up, maggots! This field trip is now a hunting expedition!

retreat.text: The mission's a failure! All units, retreat!

out_of_missiles.text: what?! you didnt bring it?! Captain your ability to ruin my field trips is uncanny!

engaged.text: Whoever kills this one gets a Hegemon Cobalt Star!
...They're good you know, go real far when you throw em!

need_help.text: We gotta deal with those pesky shields first.
Finally, someone with their head screwed on straight. Ever thought about switchin sides?

pursuing.text: You beg for your mother, we'll give you another!
We'll be good to go soon! Keep the target busy!
Finally! I damn near missed the show!

running.text: Those of you who withdrew, keep your lousy asses low!

hull_90.text: Return fire! Looks like they're playing dirty now!

hull_50.text: You've ruined our little field trip Captain!

hull_30.text: You better keep the emerjency eject primed!
You can go home now, or follow me if you have a death wish!

overload.text: watch and learn maggots, Ill show you how to slug it out!

death.text: Captain! Are you normally this incompetent or do you have to try?!
Maggots! Do you read me? You can tell this to posterity: mean old $officerName died of a bad fall!

victory.text: Looks like my good-for-nothings were good for somethin afterall. Field trip's over!
You're gonna need more training... Put that in your diaries!
We bagged the big one! Relief team, to the front!
